metadata.title: CVE-2024-35874 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: aio:Fix null ptr deref in aio_complete() wakeup list_del_init_careful() needsto be the last access to the wait queue entry - it effectively unlocksaccess. Previously, finish_wait() would see the empty list head and skiptaking the lock, and then we'd return - but the completion path would stillattempt to do the wakeup after the task_struct pointer had beenoverwritten.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
